Sure! Here are a few conditioners that you may want to consider using with the sulfate-free shampoos I recommended:

1. Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Special Conditioner: This conditioner is formulated with tea tree oil, peppermint, and lavender to help nourish and moisturize your hair, while also helping to detangle and add shine. It's a good match for the Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Special Shampoo.
2. Bumble and bumble Scalp Detox Charcoal Conditioner: This conditioner is formulated with charcoal and glycerin to help nourish and moisturize your hair, while also helping to detangle and add shine. It's a good match for the Bumble and bumble Scalp Detox Charcoal Shampoo.
3. Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Conditioner: This conditioner is formulated with charcoal, tea tree oil, and witch hazel to help nourish and moisturize your hair, while also helping to detangle and add shine. It's a good match for the Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Shampoo.

I hope these recommendations are helpful! If you have any specific questions or concerns, don't hesitate to ask.
